title: Nutrition Assessment Controller
description:
Implement Nutrition Assessment Controller with Dietary Tracking System

Create a backend controller that manages nutrition assessments and tracks dietary intake for users, enabling comprehensive nutritional monitoring and analysis.

Requirements:
- Design and implement a RESTful API controller for nutrition assessment operations
- Support CRUD operations for nutrition assessments (create, read, update, delete)
- Implement dietary tracking endpoints to log food intake with nutritional values
- Calculate and return nutritional metrics (calories, macronutrients, micronutrients)
- Enable querying dietary history by date range, meal type, or food category
- Validate input data for nutritional values and portion sizes
- Implement user-specific dietary goals and compare actual intake vs. targets
- Add pagination and filtering for assessment history retrieval
- Include proper error handling for invalid nutritional data
- Ensure data persistence with appropriate database models and relationships
- Add authentication/authorization to restrict access to user's own nutrition data
- Document API endpoints with request/response schemas

Edge cases to consider:
- Handling incomplete nutritional information for foods
- Managing multiple assessments for the same date
- Dealing with custom/user-created food entries vs. standard database entries
- Timezone considerations for dietary logging

Dependencies:
- User authentication system must be in place
- Database schema for nutrition data should be defined
- Nutritional database or API for food information
